long_description: The women's Sanuk Meltdown shoes are lined with cozy polyester shearling for warmth that you'll love when the temperature starts to drop. Heavy yarn uppers are lined with fuzzy polyester shearling to keep your toes warm. EVA midsoles offer ample cushioning and a stable platform to walk on; soft EVA footbeds feature AEGIS(R) Microbe Shield antimicrobial additive to help deter odors. Rubber/EVA outsoles grip sidewalks and city streets. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
short_description: The women's Sanuk Meltdown shoes are lined with cozy polyester shearling for warmth that you'll love when the temperature starts to drop.
